ComicInfo.Title: Jack Be Nimble; The Gingerbread Man; Little Bo Peep
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Las Vegas Annual
ComicInfo.Summary:
A few years ago Sela fell under the manipulation of Belinda and Fenton as they had her unwittingly do their dirty work for them. This time the three hit the ultimate city of sin: Las Vegas. The three immortals will change the lives of some unsuspecting people. A madam, an all world athlete and a headlining magician are all about to make important choices, ones that will affect their lives in some very terrifying ways. This Grimm Fairy Tales Annual brings fairy tales and fables to the ultimate city of sin and self indulgence! What happens in Vegas... can lead to terror.
